/* UserWebHistMapper.getUserWebHistList */ SELECT A.H_DATE , A.H_DT , A.USER_ID , B.USER_NM , B.HQ_OFFICE_CD , B.HQ_OFFICE_NM , B.STORE_CD , B.STORE_NM , (CASE WHEN A.LM_FG = 'L' THEN '로그인' WHEN A.LM_FG = 'M' THEN '메뉴' ELSE null END ) AS LM_FG , A.STAT_CD , A.LOGIN_ORGN , A.V_USER_ID , A.RESRCE_CD , REPLACE(SUBSTR(C.PATH, 0, 7) ,'/','') AS LEVEL1 , (SELECT RESRCE_NM FROM TB_WB_RESRCE_INFO WHERE RESRCE_CD=(REPLACE(SUBSTR(C.PATH, 0, 7) ,'/',''))) AS LEVEL1_NM , REPLACE(SUBSTR(C.PATH, 8, 7) ,'/','') AS LEVEL2 , (SELECT RESRCE_NM FROM TB_WB_RESRCE_INFO WHERE RESRCE_CD=(REPLACE(SUBSTR(C.PATH, 8, 7) ,'/',''))) AS LEVEL2_NM , REPLACE(SUBSTR(C.PATH, 15, 7) ,'/','') AS LEVEL3 , (SELECT RESRCE_NM FROM TB_WB_RESRCE_INFO WHERE RESRCE_CD=(REPLACE(SUBSTR(C.PATH, 15, 7) ,'/',''))) AS LEVEL3_NM FROM ( ( SELECT LOGIN_DATE AS H_DATE, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(LOGIN_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS H_DT, USER_ID, 'L' AS LM_FG, STAT_CD AS STAT_CD, LOGIN_ORGN AS LOGIN_ORGN, V_USER_ID AS V_USER_ID, '' AS RESRCE_CD FROM TB_WB_LOGIN_HIST WHERE LOGIN_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ) UNION ALL ( SELECT USE_DATE AS H_DATE, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(USE_DATE || SUBSTR(USE_DT,0,6), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS H_DT, USER_ID, 'M' AS LM_FG, '' AS STAT_CD, '' AS LOGIN_ORGN, '' AS V_USER_ID, RESRCE_CD AS RESRCE_CD FROM TB_WB_MENU_USE_HIST WHERE USE_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ) ) A , TB_WB_USER_INFO_DTL_V01 B , ( SELECT RESRCE_CD, SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH (RESRCE_CD, '/') PATH FROM TB_WB_RESRCE_INFO WHERE 1=1 START WITH P_RESRCE = '000000' CONNECT BY P_RESRCE = PRIOR RESRCE_CD ) C WHERE A.H_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND B.USER_ID (+) = A.USER_ID AND C.RESRCE_CD (+) = A.RESRCE_CD
AND B.USER_ID LIKE '%'||#{userId}||'%'
AND B.USER_NM LIKE '%'||#{userNm}||'%'
AND B.HQ_OFFICE_CD LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{hqOfficeCd})||'%'
AND B.HQ_OFFICE_NM LIKE '%'||#{hqOfficeNm}||'%'
AND B.STORE_CD LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{storeCd})||'%'
AND B.STORE_NM LIKE '%'||#{storeNm}||'%'
ORDER BY A.H_DATE asc , A.H_DT asc
